data:
Initial surveillance appointment: 
Recommendations: 
Recent MRI verifing RV/LV Function (CT for those patients who can't have an MRI)
ECHO
CPX
Holter if hx of arrhythmia

Surveillance appointments:
Every 24 - 36 months for physiological stage A (consider virtual/televisit Q 18 months and alternating with Q 18 months clinic in person visit)
Every 12 - 24 months for physiological stage B
Increase frequency for physiological stage C (every 6 - 12 months) and physiological stage D (every 3-6 months)
Labs should be ordered with surveillance for patients in physiological stage C & D
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Liver Panel (Bilirubin Total, ALP, Alb, ALT, GGT)
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St

Echo is not necessary on years when cardiac MRI or CT are completed.
Cardiac MRI or CT is ordered at discretion of cardiologist for physiological stage A & B and ordered every 12-24 months for patients in physiological stage C & D
Routine, Schedule as: Outpatient, Scheduling Location: SPH Echo, Primary Indication: Other (please specify), Other hx: congenital, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Routine, Special Instructions: schedule as outpatient, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St
Routine, Special Instructions: schedule as outpatient, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St

Cardiopulmonary Stress Test is indicated:
Every 36 - 60 months for patients in physiological stage A & B, 
Every 12 - 24 months for patients in physiological stage C. 
Every 12 months for physiological stage D
Priority: Within 2 Weeks, Special Instructions: CC SPH PACH Clinic, Schedule as: Outpatient
ECG  with surveillance visits (recommend ECG q12mths)
Routine, Order for future visit, CC Provider 2 SPH PACH Clinic, Vancouver - Burrard St

Holter Monitor: 
With surveillance visit for physiological stage A & B and at discretion of cardiologist for physiological stage C & D
Routine, Order for future visit, Schedule as: Outpatient, Scheduling Location: SPH Electrodiagnostics, CC SPH PACH Clinic
